pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:1.3: “Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:1.4: Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādetabbaṃ bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
